ideas.title: One of the first alternative app stores in the EU is shutting down
ideas.description: Setapp Mobile, one of the first alternative app stores in the EU, is shutting down next month, citing Apple's ever-changing terms.
hooks: App Store Drama: Another Alternative Bites the Dust üö®
Big Tech Wins Again? Alternative App Store Shutters
EU Tech Startup's Last Stand Against Apple

Include screenshot evidence of app store closure
Start with shocking statistic or quote
Use screen capture with dramatic voiceover
Include quick cuts to maintain high energy
Frame as thought leadership on tech ecosystem
Include more detailed contextual background
Use more professional, analytical tone

visualDirection.description: High-contrast cyberpunk-inspired color palette (deep blues, electric oranges), glitch-style text animations, fragmented screen recordings, sharp geometric typography, dynamic motion graphics suggesting technological disruption

ideas.title: Humans&, a ‘human-centric’ AI startup founded by Anthropic, xAI, Google alums, raised $480M seed round
ideas.description: Humans&, a startup that believes AI should empower people, not replace them, has reportedly raised a $480 million seed round at a $4.48 billion valuation.
hooks: AI Startup Disrupts $4.48B with Human-First Vision
Tech Legends' Secret: AI That Empowers, Not Replaces

ideas.title: SpaceX didn’t properly inspect crane before collapse at Starbase, OSHA says
ideas.description: The federal safety agency has hit SpaceX with a $115,850 fine after finding seven "serious" violations during its investigation.
hooks: SpaceX's $115k Crane Fail: Safety Secrets Revealed
When Rocket Science Meets Workplace Safety Fails
OSHA Drops the Hammer on SpaceX Crane Incident

tips: Use dynamic motion graphics to visualize crane collapse
Include quick text overlays with key violation details
Create a visually engaging timeline of the incident
Design each slide with a different safety insight
Use infographic-style layouts to break down OSHA findings
Include a final slide with key takeaways and learning points
Start with a dramatic reconstruction of the crane incident
Use quick cuts and high-energy transitions
Include expert commentary-style voiceover
Frame content as a professional safety learning opportunity
Use more technical language and detailed analysis
Include potential industry-wide implications
